1661120.name: Carrier Command 2 Soundtrack
1661120.description:
The Carrier Command 2 original sound track was created by Chris Randle and Jon Daou (Trium).

This sound track features over 25 minutes of retro deepwave synth. This album contains 5 full tracks, created, composed, and authored specifically for album listening.

The music of Carrier Command 2 is created to celebrate the golden era of 1980s video game development, and pay homage to the original Carrier Command(1988) and other games and films that have inspired Carrier Command 2.
